name: Train Coat
description:
Dutch Chicken is a one man indie dev team, consisting of Randy Paulus (aka Kills). He is a 3D Game Art student currently enrolled at the HKU, The Netherlands.

Other Media:

Follow the development of Train Coat on multiple platforms, to always catch the latest updates.

  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/dutchchicken_
  • Insta: https://www.instagram.com/dutchchicken/
  • Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/killsysem_tv (Weekends at 1PM CEST)
